medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Sharp epigastric pain woke him up from sleep at 1 AM, lasting one hour. Intermittent epigastric pain continued for the rest of the night, lasting a few minutes at a time. Attempted to induce vomiting but could not. Denies nausea and vomiting. Last meal was at 9 PM. Reports flatus and loose bowel movement at 2 AM. No previous episodes of similar pain.
